title: Support for dark theme is missing
text: Hoping to see dark theme support added soon

title: Doesn’t work
text:
App asked me to log in using the code sent on the Authenticator App, which I couldn’t access because I wasn’t verified because I didn’t have an access code- which I needed to get on the App. 
I tried using the the alternate login option which also asked me to use the code sent to my Authenticator App.

title: Terrible
text: Confusing and not user friendly. Almost pointless has to be a better way.

title: Locked out of my accounts!
text:
Gonna give a 1 because this app didn't save my accounts when I switched iPhones so I got locked out of Facebook and Instagram because they disappeared from the Authenticator app (Microsoft🚩) even tho I saved all the backup codes they don’t work.
Still trying to fix this!

title: Code to log into the app???
text: I’m stuck in a loop the app is asking me to input a code into the app to add my account. I’m so confused.

title: LOVE 365 - DISLIKE this app
text:
Not sure if you guys just started from scratch but Google has been doing MFA on many of their apps - so much less painfully for awhile now. 

This treasure hunt set up process is ridiculous. Disjointed. Having to login to one site, then click on a link to another web page? Scan a QR code with your phone camera, then go back to the tab you started on, critical information like Allow Notifications not highlighted. Scan another QR code at some point with the app you hopefully were able to install. 

This process could be so much better. Compare it to Google, step for step. Is this really the best a multi-billion dollar company can produce? 

Start over and think about your users. Recent updates have improved from a year or two ago - but this set up is nuts. 

I am happy to walk someone through what this process looks like for my professional users who need this app the most.

title: Hate it
text: My school requires us to have this. And now I’m stuck in an endless loop where I cannot sign into my accounts no matter what. This is so stupid. I hate it. It doesn’t give me the codes to sign in, won’t let me sign in any other way. Won’t give me notifications to approve me sign in. Useless.

title: Dark theme
text: How is there still no dark theme?

title: Why am I required to use this app?!
text: I have my password and username, I do not want to download a stupid app to verify my log in. This app is annoying and pointless. LET ME LOG IN WITHOUT THIS STUPID APP

title: Loss of watchOS was inconvenient
text: Need a way to bring back WatchOS authentication.   Yes, there is no facial recognition on a watch, but passcodes and response codes are sufficient without having to track down a phone for every MS login, email & calendar validation throughout the day.   Was much better with activation/authentication on your wrist.

title: Authenticator
text: Maddening to wotk with. I try not to use it and do not understand it

title: This all does nothing but make Microsoft apps more painful to use
text: I hate this app.

title: Not functional
text: Worst app I’ve ever used - has made it impossible for me to access my work email. Help page is useless. Prompts me to enter numbers in the app, but the app has no place for me to enter these numbers. OR prompts me to enter numbers in the app from the app, which is impossible to do. Insane.

title: Re tar ded
text: I absolutely hate having to use this platform. Waste of time and unprofessional to have to pull out in front of patients to do your job. As if they want to think why is this person on the phone while with me and vice versa we have to explain ourselves to everyone so they don’t think that

title: Can’t use Apple Pro vision
text: Very frustrating. You buy the Apple pro but you can’t even use enterprise level applications when the target audience were professionals who wanted to take their physical environments virtual.

title: Unreliable
text: This app stops working often. Very often. And it affects other Office 365 apps. I was finally able to get connected after 30 minutes, but it’s completely blocking mobile 365 apps again. On the computer Teams just shows you unavailable and the status can’t be changed. Have to start work early just to see if it’s going to act up. It’s getting really old. Is this app being phased out or no longer being updated by a support team? The office suite is steeply going downhill.

title: Why
text: This app makes zero sense I tried logging into my Xbox account today when all of a sudden it stopped working and it made me use this app to "log into my account". I tried logging in and it told me I needed the authenticator app to log in when I'm literally using the app right now???? What?????

title: Cant sign in
text:
Why do I need to use the authenticator app to log into the authenticator app? 
That doesn’t make any sense. This has to be a bug.

title: Essential
text: I don’t know too much about security but this app is always quick easy and very secure

title: Not responding to requests
text: Fails to receive code requests sent from my laptop. Worst of all there are not alternatives to logging in. This is a combination of bug and poor UX.

title: Genuinely one of the worst experiences I’ve had on a very simple app
text: I can’t log into any of my school accounts because my school insists on using this product and I can’t even get into my Authenticator without authentication that my Authenticator app approves me and it’s beyond frustrating

title: Needs a refresh
text:
Two things:
A. It needs to better align with the iOS design language. For example, when I pull down the list of accounts it should display a search box. This a pretty common design language across iOS apps. A hold down should be a refresh. 
B. Most other password managers support Apple Watch. Where is the support for Apple Watch? Why? Well because of OTP support. I am all in on OTP in Authenticator but I am thinking of moving to another app because I can get my OTP for certain accounts on my Watch so I always have them handy. Not for all sites but just those that have high frequency of OTP prompting, I use away from my phone, and don’t store extremely sensitive content.

title: 垃圾产品
text: 不停的掉线，用起来让人烦躁不堪。

title: Will give five stars when...
text:
Microsoft needs to add datetime stamp values for when a record is created, when a record is modified and when the last time the record was successfully used.

Note:  a ".record" is a collection of fields that contain data about a given entity e.g. a credential entry in MS Authenticator.

title: Authenticate to authenticate
text: I’m trying to log into Authenticator to authenticate my company’s log in. Except to do so I need to login to the app to authenticate the log in, which isn’t possible. This is an incredibly system, how could this not be seen as an issue?

title: The worst
text: This is the worst authenticator app I've ever used. It doesn't allow you to authenticate by any other way than using the app. So, if you only have access to this authenticator app on one device, and your device is lost or broken, you will lose access to everything.

title: Stay away
text: This is the most frustrating app of all time. In order for me to login to any of my accounts I need to get a code from this app and it hasn’t worked in the last month. Want to get ahold of someone to help? Well you need to log in to get help with that and of course you can’t log in if it’s not working.

title: Why make an Authenticator if it is Impossible to use!
text: I do not know where to begin with this application. It is utterly infuriating with how frequently I get locked out of my emails and work accounts because of this dang Authenticator. It is so lacksidasical, you try to log into an email this app opens and is like “go to your Authenticator app and enter the below listed number,” well okay, sure but you are already in the app!!! Just freaking unlock so I can work and not have to be so infuriated with this dang impenetrable door. Nothing works. I’ve deleted, reinstalled, updated. I wish these apps were never implemented. What happened to “Two-Factor Authentication” like texts and emails to a back up email were so much easier.

title: Apple Watch
text: One star, bring the apple watch functionality back please.

title: MS Authenticator is AWFUL
text: May the Lord help you if you break a phone that had this. The authenticator app will ask you to sign in using a code on the app TO GET INTO THE APP. Very frustrating, can’t use my school email because of this nonsense, sad Microsoft with all its money doesn’t have ANY WAY TO FIX IT…

title: Fix it come on now
text:
Simplify having two Microsoft accounts as recovery or as primary accounts 
change notification jargon to improve security by not notifying what each notification is for- use two primary accounts and both of them are not work or office emails then you’re going to have a hard time loading all of your codes from each of those emails into one app easily accessible by the owner of those emails and authenticator account  it is ridiculous backwards, and opposite of what I’ve heard from customer service and Microsoft  stop giving people the runaround the stack needs fixing that

You care about making money somehow or do you care about having a useful app?  Instead of making the people happy and spoon feeding them each notification with exactly what it is. Perhaps you can disclaim initially and declare that you will only notify for security reasons but you’re alerts your banners they should be either customizable or we should be able to hide them?

title: Road block rather than helpful
text: This app has given me nothing but trouble. No code, no place to add code generated elsewhere. This thing just runs me around in circles. Always dead-ending with this awful authenticator system.

title: Seems secure, yet not simple.
text: Seems secure but still not easy to use.

title: Microsoft is a joke
text: How are you still in business???

title: Companies force you to put this stupid app on your phone
text: Terrible app that companies force you to shove onto your phone, which effectively makes your phone a work phone, yet they don’t cover the bill. Ha! This app shouldn’t exist if Microsoft is going to allow companies to force employees to use it.

title: Perdí mi teléfono y con eso el acceso al Autheticator
text: Hola, perdí mi teléfono y en el nuevo no he podido acceder al Authenticator y con ello a mi cuenta de la empresa donde trabajo, necesito por favor que alguien me ayude con esto aunque no tenía copia de seguridad y no tengo otra forma de acceder a mi cuenta

title: App doesn’t work.
text: Not getting approval request on my iPhone. Notifications are on. Tried everything I know.

title: Vision, pro capability compatibility
text: Would like Vision Pro compatibility, so I can use Microsoft products

title: WORST APP EVER!!
text: I have no clue how this app has a 4.8 overall rating. Let me start with the biggest problem of all. When you add your most important apps into this if you delete the app from the authenticator it's STILL CONNECTED TO IT!! WHICH MEANS THE NEXT TIME YOU GO TO LOG INTO YOUR SOCIAL MEDIA OR BANKING OR PAID APP IT'S GOING TO ASK FOR A CODE BUT THERE IS NO CODE BECAUSE U DELETED IT. And if you don't have another way to get a code for that app you're screwed. And to top it off their customer service or lack there of is horrible.  You can't call any number. Just read the threads online about this app before you decide to use it. I can't log into my clock in and out account for work which tells me my hours and pay and has my W2 I can't access any of it!!!

title: Vision Pro support???!!
text: It seems so absurd that this app is not available for Vision Pro after having nearly a year to develop it. It seems like an intentional oversight on Microsoft’s part to hamper enterprise adoption.  So petty of Microsoft.

title: Worst product by garbage company
text: Zero customer support service. App doesn’t work with new IPhone 15 pro update 17.3.1. Avoid all microsoft products at all cost. Waste of time and money in 2023. The company hasn’t moved from 1990 mentality. Time to write off Microsoft.

title: Complicated set up but works good after System Admin Intervention
text: Like most Micro$oft products, this app is highly unintuitive and inflexible—designed by and for tech heads, not end users—but works smoothly after some support from our system administrator.

title: Trash
text: This app gets a one star review for the sole reason that I’m forced to download this trash to access a simple work email

title: Won’t allow me to log in to teams on my phone
text: Typical. Program creates a loop that prevents its self from working.  Way to go.

title: Bad
text:
Switched phones, got locked out, and can’t get in my email because I have to authorize with the authenticator app and my authenticator is not sending my any verification codes. 

Why isn’t my password, phone number, alternate email, and Face ID enough?

title: Not great
text: It hasn’t been updated with new functionality in years. You can’t approve from the banner, so why give the option?

title: Horrible
text: Every single time the company does an update it takes ten minutes to get connected. Today I have been trying for 20 minutes and it takes so long for the app to respond it times out. I have never once, in the year we’ve been using it, had the number that pops up on the screen matched what the app wants. Not one time. So frustrating.

title: Good until now
text: Had this app for work for maybe 6 months now, tried logging in and I needed to type in the verification code as usual. Except now I need to re login to my verification app. Okay no problem, until I got a screen saying I need to open an Authenticator app and type in the numbers there…when I’m already in the app. Now not only can’t I get into my work account but I can’t even put that work account into the Authenticator. Fix this.
